participant_id.Description: ID of the NLA participant assigned by the experimenter

Sex.Description: M representing male, F representing female participant

Age.Description: Age of the participant in years

End_Pain1_Intensity.Description: Subjective rating of the intensity of the pain on a scale of 0 to 10 (Low to High) experienced by the participant at the end of the first pain session

End_Pain1_Unpleasantness.Description: Subjective rating of the unpleasantness of the pain on a scale of 0 to 10 (Low to High) experienced by the participant at the end of the first pain session

End_Pain_2_Intensity.Description: Subjective rating of the intensity of the pain on a scale of 0 to 10 (Low to High) experienced by the participant at the end of the second pain session

End_Pain2_Unpleasantness.Description: Subjective rating of the unpleasantness of the pain on a scale of 0 to 10 (Low to High) experienced by the participant at the end of the second pain session

Total_Lidocaine(mg).Description: Total amount of Lidocaine administered to the participant in milligrams

Body_Mass(kg).Description: Body mass of the participant in kilograms

Total_Lidocaine(mg/kg).Description: Total amount of Lidocaine administered to the participant per kilogram of body mass

Time_of_Lidocaine_Administration(min).Description: Time duration in minutes for which the Lidocaine was administered to the participant
